Package javelin.model.item.consumable

Class Scroll

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.model.item.Item
      • javelin.model.item.consumable.Scroll
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    public class Scroll
extends Item
    Scrolls are a catch-all, spell-completion item type for non-#iswand Spells. Scrolls provoke attacks of opportunity and require spell-completion capabilities.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
